abstract: Rio Tinto, the global miner, expects to receive at least $741 million from the flotation of its U.S. coal-mining unit, Cloud Peak Energy, on the New York Stock Exchange, Rio said Monday.
snippet: Rio Tinto, the global miner, expects to receive at least $741 million from the flotation of its U.S. coal-mining unit, Cloud Peak Energy, on the New York Stock Exchange, Rio said Monday.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto, the global miner, expects to receive at least $741 million from the flotation of its U.S. coal-mining unit, Cloud Peak Energy, on the New York Stock Exchange, Rio said Monday.

headline.main: Rio to Pocket $741 Million From Cloud Peak I.P.O.
